code: function setCookie(name,value,days){const expires=new Date();expires.setTime(expires.getTime()+days*24*60*60*1000);document.cookie="".concat(name,"=").concat(value,";expires=").concat(expires.toUTCString(),";path=/");}function getCookie(name){const keyValue=document.cookie.match("(^|;) ?".concat(name,"=([^;]*)(;|$)"));return keyValue?keyValue[2]:null;}function deleteCookie(name){document.cookie="".concat(name,"=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;path=/");}export{setCookie,getCookie,deleteCookie};
